reviews.review: Ну норм наиграл 1255ч и скилл говно

This game is over run with cheaters. You will be punished for playing with cheaters even though they match you up with them and if you leave a game you get punished. ( LOSE - LOSE SITUATION ) 
THERE IS AN ANTI CHEAT SYSTEM CALLED OVERWATCH CASES (UNFORTUNATELY CHEATERS DON'T REPORT CHEATERS )

CSGO is the best competetive FPS on PC.

If you like challenges, this game is for you!

Bardzo dobra gra. Niestety bez prime nie da się grać przez wielką ilość cheaterów, lecz gdy juz sie ma tego prima i kilka set godzin to (chociaz ja) nie trafia się na żadnych cheaterów.  Ostatnio bardzo zwiększyła się liczba aktualizacji w porównaniu do tego co było z 3 lata temu. Jeżeli nie spotka się w meczu żadnego rosyjskiego dzieciaka który będzie śpiewał do mikrofonu to gra się super.
если бы не читеры, это был бы лучший бесплатный шутер, а так увы - 4/5
shit ass fucking reporting system , shit ass fucking ban system , shit ass fucking anti cheat system , shit ass fucking game
I enjoy playing this game over 2000 hours now .)

Лучшая игра EVER. Особенно если хочешь порезвиться с читами
вагон читеров, с которыми никак не борется администрация.

Oynanacak bir oyun değil. Eski Counter Strike ruhu kalmamış. Hiçbir şekilde almanın oynamanın bir anlamı yok. CS oynamak istiyorsanız arkadaşlarla karşılıklı oynayın sadece. Her yer hile dolu, toksik oyuncularla dolu. Bütün serverlar küçük yaşta çocuklarla dolu. Hepsi de slavik diller konuşuyor. İndirip tekrar deneyeyim dedim, pişman oldum. Performans konusunda sıkıntıları var. Rainbow Six'i rahat oynayabildiğim bilgisayarımda CS:GO framedroplar, donmalar yaşatıyor. 1/10

Mam blisko 1k godzin. Ta gra jest skurwiona ale śmieszna. Polecam
A no tak i fakt tego że zapłaciłem za to 50 złotych a teraz jest za darmo...
The best game ever made btw. You should play it.
This game is the epic skins

Very skillbased, but a lot of fun. If you have patience and pull trough, it's a fantastic game.

You! Yes you! Do you have have a happy life with a good social life, good grades, good hobbies, maybe a girlfriend/boyfriend, a fit body? Well it's your lucky day because we've got just the right solution for you!! Buy CS:GO today and f*ck your own life!! CS:GO will take all of the good aspects of your life, it will murder them, then it will burn them, then it will replace them with stress... For a good price as well.
